song_lyrics: Sundarvar shaṇagār karīne, sihāsan par shobhe re;
Harivar keru rūp joīne, munivarnā man lobhe re... Sundar° 1
Chhogaliyā fūlḍā kerā chhāyā, molīḍāne māthe re;
Fore bhamarā matvālā thaī, ḍole sāthe sāthe re.. Sundar° 2
Kāju bhāl tilak kesarnu, rūḍu rang bharelu re;
Bhrakuṭī neṇ nāsikā bhāḷī, tan kurbān karelu re... Sundar° 3
Goḷ kapol karṇa shubh kunḍaḷ, Harinu mukhaḍu hasatu re;
Brahmānand kahe te joīne paḷ, man chheṭe nathī khasatu re... Sundar° 4
title: Sundarvar shaṇagār karīne sihāsan par shobhe re

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-9028: Sadguru Brahmanand Swami

Category: Murtina Pad
